persona: Professional, 42, time-conscious, wants efficiency and clear benefits
opening_objection: I've heard of this game, but I'm not really sure what makes it special. Can you explain?
follow_ups: You're giving me a lot of information... can you just give me the main reason to try it?
I still don't get it. What would my first hour actually look like?

difficulty_toggles.Time Pressure: They interrupt after 90 seconds: "Can you wrap this up? I have another call."
difficulty_toggles.Stronger Skepticism: They push back twice as hard: "My friend said this game is overhyped. Prove them wrong."

persona: Busy parent, 35, skeptical of gaming, needs clear value proposition
opening_objection: Why should I play this instead of [popular alternative]? What's the difference?
follow_ups: You're giving me a lot of information... can you just give me the main reason to try it?
I still don't get it. What would my first hour actually look like?

difficulty_toggles.Time Pressure: They interrupt after 90 seconds: "Can you wrap this up? I have another call."
difficulty_toggles.Stronger Skepticism: They push back twice as hard: "My friend said this game is overhyped. Prove them wrong."

persona: Anxious newcomer, 25, worried about skill level and fitting in
opening_objection: I tried a game like this before and the community was toxic. How is this different?
follow_ups: It sounds like you're just reading from a script. Did you hear what I just said about my schedule?
You keep talking about features, but I told you my main concern is [X]. Can you address that?

difficulty_toggles.Multiple Concerns: They layer 3 objections at once instead of 1.
difficulty_toggles.Emotional Intensity: They sound frustrated/anxious; mishandling tone ends the call.

persona: Interested but non-committal, 30, needs gentle push to concrete action
opening_objection: This sounds interesting, but I need to think about it. Can I get back to you?
follow_ups: That's a lot to consider. What exactly are you asking me to do right now?
I hear you, but 'sometime soon' is too vague. When specifically works for me?

difficulty_toggles.Time Pressure: You have only 2 minutes to secure commitment before they "have to go."
difficulty_toggles.Analysis Paralysis: They ask for 3+ more details before committing; you must redirect firmly but kindly.

persona: Lonely player, 31, craves community but fears rejection
opening_objection: I don't know anyone who plays this. Would I just be joining random strangers?
follow_ups: You seem nice, but I'm still not convinced this is for someone like me.
How do I know the other players will be welcoming? I've had bad experiences.

difficulty_toggles.Cold Opening: They start defensive: "Make this quick. I don't have much time."
difficulty_toggles.Trust Test: They explicitly test if you're authentic: "Are you reading from a script?"

persona: Critical thinker, 38, asks probing questions to test your knowledge
opening_objection: I'm interested, but I have some concerns about the time commitment and learning curve.
follow_ups: It sounds like you're just reading from a script. Did you hear what I just said about my schedule?
